name: shopify-themekit-boilerplate
description: Boilerplate I've been using lately to build Shopify themes from scratch.

scripts.3:
dotenv cross-var echo 'PASSWORD=%PASSWORD%
DEV_THEME=%DEV_THEME%
PROD_THEME=%PROD_THEME%
STORE=%STORE%' > variables
scripts.5: git add .; git commit -m 'Init'; git push origin main; git checkout -b 'development'; git add .; git commit -m 'Init development branch'; git push origin development
scripts.init: cross-var $npm_execpath run 1; cross-var $npm_execpath run 2; cross-var $npm_execpath run 3; cross-var $npm_execpath run 4; cross-var $npm_execpath run 5; cross-var $npm_execpath run 6; cross-var $npm_execpath run 7;

author: @krjo
